abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Effect: MOVE as far as possible in a straight line, passing through units. Then, units passed through during this move take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage and 1 damage to another adjacent unit.

upgrades.name: Bladed
upgrades.description: Charge has a (5+) chance to grant retaliation until the start of its next turn.

upgrades.name: Overclocked
upgrades.description: At 1 hp or lower, gain free movement

abilities.name: Pain Frenzy
abilities.description: Effect: Unit gains 2 berserk or 2 speed.

abilities.name: Cauterize
abilities.description: Effect: Clear all negative tokens on self or a unit, then deal 1 fire damage to them. This damage can't slay a unit.

upgrades.name: Stim Haze
upgrades.description: At 1 hp or lower, self and adjacent allies become curseproof

upgrades.name: Frenzy Hook
upgrades.description: At 1 hp or lower, Meat Hook can pull up to three units

upgrades.name: Adrenalize
upgrades.description: Allies gain 1 speed per negative token removed from Cauterize

abilities.name: Rev
abilities.description: Effect: Gain 1 strength and speed (5+) and retaliation until the start of this unit's next turn.

abilities.name: Chainsaw:
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage, Effect: (4+): 1 damage again, (6+): 1 damage again

abilities.name: Wild Slashes
abilities.description: Effect: MOVE as far as possible in a straight line. Then, all units adjacent to any space of this MOVE take 1 fire damage.

upgrades.name: Heavy Swing
upgrades.description: May step 1 before and after using Chainsaw.

upgrades.name: Rile
upgrades.description: Rev grants one (5+) or two berserk.

upgrades.name: Bloody Teeth
upgrades.description: At 0 hp, damage ignores all armor.

traits.name: Hellwheel
traits.description: This unit may spend speed tokens as strength. May pass through units but not end their turn in their spaces.

abilities.name: Exfoliate
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: (4+) 1 damage again. (6+) 1 damage again.

abilities.name: Spin Out
abilities.description: Effect: Unit MOVEs as far as possible in a straight line. The first enemy unit this unit passes through during this MOVE takes 1 fire damage. Then this unit gains 2 speed.

upgrades.name: Barbed Wheel
upgrades.description: Spin Out may pull a unit in range 3 one space before its MOVE

upgrades.name: Hurtle
upgrades.description: At 1 hp, may MOVE again for free at any point during turn

traits.name: Steaming Rage
traits.description: When taking damage, gain 1 berserk and 1 strength. This effect can’t trigger more than one a round.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: Effect: Pull all units in range 2 one space towards this unit. Then splash (self): 1 fire damage and destroy all adjacent walls.

abilities.name: Building Rage
abilities.description: Effect: Gain 1 strength and 1 berserk, (4+) then gain retaliation until end of this unit’s next turn.

abilities.name: Rip and Tear
abilities.description: On hit: On hit, 2 damage. Deal 1 damage again if this unit has 3 or less hp, then deal 1 damage again if it is at 1 hp or less.

upgrades.name: Machineheart
upgrades.description: At 1 hp or lower, gains super armor.

upgrades.name: Bifurcate
upgrades.description: Rip and Tear obliterates units that it reduces to 0 hp.

traits.name: Fueled by Rage
traits.description: Gain 1 berserk token at the start of your turn. You may spend berserk tokens as speed tokens.

abilities.name: Superheated Chainblade
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage, Effect: (4+): 1 fire damage again, (6+): 1 fire damage again

soulAbilities.name: Ignite
soulAbilities.description: Range 3: Effect: Deal 1 fire damage to self or a unit in range, ignoring armor. That damage cannot slay them. Unit gains 1 berserk, and 1 speed.

soulAbilities.name: Glory Kill
soulAbilities.description: Effect: Obliterate an adjacent unit at 1 hp or lower. Gain 2 strength, then step 2.

upgrade.name: Bone Wall
upgrade.description: You can use your units as cover. While in cover your abilities gain +2 range.

upgrade.name: Gun Kata
upgrade.description: Ranged attacks gain a minimum range of 1 and push units 1 if they are adjacent.

upgrade.name: Clutch Reload
upgrade.description: Your ranged attacks gain headshot: reload.

upgrade.name: Grenade Jump
upgrade.description: Effect: Splash (self): 1 fire damage, then step 2 with free movement.

upgrade.name: Armor Lock
upgrade.description: Effect: Push all adjacent foes 1. Until the end of your next turn, you gain super armor, cover from all directions, and allied units can use as a cover object. You cannot MOVE, step or be pushed or pulled for the same duration.

upgrade.name: Devil Bullet
upgrade.description: Effect: Reload. Your next attack ignores armor, and automatically triggers headshot effects on hit.

upgrade.name: Superkick
upgrade.description: Effect: Push an adjacent unit 3. Foes gain 1 vulnerable if they would be pushed into a wall or elevated space.

upgrade.name: LV4 Living Cannon
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 fire damage and 1 vulnerable. Splash (target): 1 fire damage. Headshot: Splash (target) 1 vulnerable. *Effect: Must reload twice before this is usable.

upgrade.name: SG88 two barrel shotgun
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage, then 1 damage. Effect: push 1, then push 1. Headshot: Reload.

upgrade.name: Unholy Sixgun
upgrade.description: On hit: 2 damage. Headshot: this attack deals +1 base damage on hit for the rest of combat, up to a maximum of 4.

upgrade.name: Double Tap
upgrade.description: Trigger: you reduce a unit to exactly 1 hp. Effect: you may immediately activate this ability to deal 1 damage to it, ignoring armor.

upgrade.name: Frag Bullet
upgrade.description: Trigger: You hit an attack. Effect: Target gains 3 vulnerable after the ability resolves.

upgrade.name: Bullet hustle
upgrade.description: Trigger: After any unit MOVEs. Effect: Step 2, then deal 1 damage to a unit in range 3.

upgrade.name: Overwatch
upgrade.description: Effect: Reload. Until the start of your next turn, enemy units entering adjacent spaces without being pushed or pulled there take 1 damage and are pushed 1, interrupting their movement. This effect can only trigger once a turn.

upgrade.name: Bullet Sonata
upgrade.description: Effect: Every foe in range 2 takes 1 damage, ignoring armor, and is pushed 1.

upgrade.name: S.T.G.
upgrade.description: Trigger: Headshot. Effect: Deal 6 devil damage to the targeted unit, sending them Straight to the Grave.
